channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Jetson AGX Xavier series, Jetson Xavier NX, Jetson TX2 series, Jetson TX2 NX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Jetson AGX Xavier series, Jetson Xavier NX, Jetson TX2 series, Jetson TX2 NX

item.title: CVE-2021-1111|2024-08-03T15:55:18.644Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20series%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20nx
item.description: Bootloader contains a vulnerability in the NV3P server where any user with physical access through USB can trigger an incorrect bounds check, which may lead to buffer overflow, resulting in limited information disclosure, limited data integrity, and denial of service across all components.

item.title: CVE-2021-1114|2024-08-03T15:55:18.530Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20series%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20nx
item.description: NVIDIA Linux kernel distributions contain a vulnerability in the kernel crypto node, where use after free may lead to complete denial of service.
